sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
# Introduction

Welcome to the Lunaby API documentation. Access state-of-the-art AI models for chat completions, reasoning, and image generation through a simple, standardized API.

<CodeBlock
  title="Base URL"
  tabs={[{ id: "url", label: "URL", language: "text", code: "https://api.lunie.dev" }]}
/>

sections.title: Error Codes
sections.content:
# Error Codes

The API returns standard HTTP status codes to indicate the success or failure of a request.

<DataTable
  headers={["Code", "Description"]}
  rows={[
    [{ code: "200 OK" }, { value: "The request was successful." }],
    [{ code: "400 Bad Request" }, { value: "The request was invalid or missing parameters." }],
    [{ code: "401 Unauthorized" }, { value: "Authentication failed or API key is missing." }],
    [{ code: "429 Too Many Requests" }, { value: "You have hit the rate limit." }],
    [{ code: "500 Internal Server Error" }, { value: "An issue occurred on our servers." }]
  ]}
/>
sections.description: HTTP status codes and error handling
